Author&#039;s Note:

All track title translations are straightforward word-for-word translation from Japanese to English, save for track two.  After much consideration of lyrical content, I decided not to go with the more literal translation "Technique of Love" or "Love Skill" as they seemed flat and disinteresting, not to mention dumbed-down and a discredit to the song itself.  If you have any suggestions as to different translations of the title, feel free to contact me via PM or comment area.
